tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_history TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    dob DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    treatment VARCHAR(100),
    date_visited DATE
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255),
age INT,
gender VARCHAR(10),
address TEXT);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
allergies TEXT,
conditions TEXT,
medications TEXT);

CREATE TABLE treatment_information (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
date DATE,
treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
treatment_details TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Demographic (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Demographic(patient_id),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  allergies TEXT,
  medications TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentInfo (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Demographic(patient_id),
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_date DATE,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchInfo (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Demographic(patient_id),
  research_topic VARCHAR(100),
  research_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50)
);
